member.name: T:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents
member.summary: Represents a control that provides a way to initialize the event handlers of the report viewer.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.RenderingBegin
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the rendering of the report begins.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.RenderingEnd
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the rendering of the report ends.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.PrintBegin
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called prior to starting the print report command.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.PrintEnd
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the print document (Adobe PDF) is ready for download, but prior to being send to the printer.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.ExportBegin
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called prior to starting the report export command.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.ExportEnd
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the exported document is ready for download, but prior to the actual downloading.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.PageReady
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called every time a page from the report is rendered and ready for display.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.UpdateUi
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called every time the UI needs an update; can be used for changing the UI of the report viewer while interacting with the reports.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.Error
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when an error occurs.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.Ready
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the report viewer template is loaded.

member.summary: Represents a class that provides a way to initialize the parameter editors of the report viewer.

member.summary: The default constructor.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ParameterEditors.MultiSelectEditor
member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle parameters that have provided AvailableValues and MultiValue set to true.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ParameterEditors.SingleSelectEditor
member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle parameters that have provided AvailableValues and MultiValue set to false.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ParameterEditors.MultiValueEditor
member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle parameters that have MultiValue set to true but have not provided AvailableValues.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ParameterEditors.DateTimeEditor
member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle DateTime parameters.

member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle String parameters.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ParameterEditors.NumberEditor
member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle Numeric parameters.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ParameterEditors.BooleanEditor
member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle Boolean parameters.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ParameterEditors.DefaultEditor
member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle non defined parameters.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ParameterEditors.CustomEditors
member.summary: Attach parameter editors that can handle custom scenarios. For example MultiValue parameter of DateTime type. Custom editors are added before all other editors, in the specified order.

member.name: T:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.PrintMode
member.summary: Specifies how the viewer should handle the print command.

member.name: F:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.PrintMode.AutoSelect
member.summary: Specifies that the viewer should automatically determine how to print: through the browser's PDF plug-in or through export to a PDF file.

member.name: F:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.PrintMode.ForcePDFPlugin
member.summary: Specifies that the viewer should always use the PDF plugin regardless of the browser's version and settings.

member.name: F:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.PrintMode.ForcePDFFile
member.summary: Specifies that the viewer should always export the report document to PDF format with the 'print' script enabled.

member.name: T:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportSource
member.summary: Provides a class for the report source. This is a class that contains the collection of parameter values, report identifier and type

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportSource.#ctor
member.summary: The default constructor.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportSource.Parameters
member.summary: A collection of parameter values passed to the object when initialized.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportSource.Identifier
member.summary: The report identifier.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportSource.IdentifierType
member.summary: The type of the report identifier.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ServiceUrl
member.summary: The URL of the service which will provide the report viewer with reports. The service must be properly configured so that the report viewer can successfully communicate with the server. For more information on how to configure the service please check http://www.telerik.com/help/reporting/telerik-reporting-rest-conception.html.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.TemplateUrl
member.summary: The URL for the report viewer template. The template can be edited - new functionalities can be added and not needed ones can be removed. For more information please check http://www.telerik.com/help/reporting/html5-report-viewer-templates.html.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ReportSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the for the report displayed in the viewer.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.PrintMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the print mode of the viewer. Three modes exist currently: AutoSelect - Specifies that the viewer should automatically determine how to print: through the browser's PDF plug-in or through export to a PDF file. ForcePDFPlugin - Specifies that the viewer should always use the PDF plugin regardless of the browser's version and settings. ForcePDFFile - Specifies that the viewer should always export the report document to PDF format with the 'print' script enabled.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ViewMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the viewer is in interactive or print preview mode. PrintPreview - Displays the paginated report as if it is printed on paper. Interactivity is not enabled. Interactive - Displays the report in its original width and height with no paging. Additionally interactivity is enabled.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ScaleMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale mode of the viewer. Three modes exist currently: FitPage - The whole report will fit on the page (will zoom in or out), regardless of its width and height. FitPageWidth - The report will be zoomed in or out so that the width of the screen and the width of the report match. Specific - Uses the scale to zoom in and out the report.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.Scale
member.summary: Zoom in and out the report using the scale. 1.0 is equal to 100%, i.e. the original size of the report.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.DocumentMapVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets the viewer’s document map initial visibility state.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ParametersAreaVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets the viewer’s parameters area initial visibility state.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the current page number of the report.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.DisabledButtonClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the class to be used by buttons in the disabled state.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.CheckedButtonClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the class to be used by buttons in the checked state.

member.summary: Defers the script initialization statement.
